Purpose: To quantify Spironolactone (Aldactone) concentrations in patient specimens for clinical evaluation and therapeutic monitoring.
Container: Plasma: EDTA or lithium heparin tube; Serum: red-top tube; Urine: clean dry container; Whole blood: EDTA tube
